meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Grieve</kanji> for a <kanji>pathetic</kanji> situation by offering your <vocabulary>condolence</vocabulary>s. Showing <vocabulary>regret</vocabulary> is the best way to handle it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
